name: Beverly Flight Center, Inc.
about: Beverly Flight Center, Inc. is a family-owned and operated flight training and aircraft rental facility serving Boston's North Shore for over 25 years. Located at the Beverly Municipal Airport, we offer top-tier flight, ground, and simulator training. As a Cirrus Training Center and CATS training facility for FAA Knowledge Exams, we provide quality training from student pilot certificates to ATP licenses using a fleet of 13 well-maintained aircraft. Our mission is to create safe, competent, and quality pilots through a structured and welcoming environment. With a commitment to safety and community, we elevate your flight training experience, making us the premier choice for aspiring pilots in the Boston area.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
